class.name: EditorScenePostImportPlugin
class.brief_description: Plugin to control and modifying the process of importing a scene.
class.description: This plugin type exists to modify the process of importing scenes, allowing to change the content as well as add importer options at every stage of the process.

method.name: _get_import_options
method.description: Override to add general import options. These will appear in the main import dock on the editor. Add options via [method add_import_option] and [method add_import_option_advanced].

method.name: _get_internal_import_options
method.description: Override to add internal import options. These will appear in the 3D scene import dialog. Add options via [method add_import_option] and [method add_import_option_advanced].

method.name: _get_internal_option_update_view_required
method.description: Return true whether updating the 3D view of the import dialog needs to be updated if an option has changed.

method.name: _get_internal_option_visibility
method.description: Return true or false whether a given option should be visible. Return null to ignore.

method.name: _get_option_visibility
method.description: Return true or false whether a given option should be visible. Return null to ignore.

method.name: _internal_process
method.description: Process a specific node or resource for a given category.

method.name: _post_process
method.description: Post process the scene. This function is called after the final scene has been configured.

method.name: _pre_process
method.description: Pre Process the scene. This function is called right after the scene format loader loaded the scene and no changes have been made.

method.name: add_import_option
method.description: Add a specific import option (name and default value only). This function can only be called from [method _get_import_options] and [method _get_internal_import_options].

method.name: add_import_option_advanced
method.description: Add a specific import option. This function can only be called from [method _get_import_options] and [method _get_internal_import_options].

method.name: get_option_value
method.description: Query the value of an option. This function can only be called from those querying visibility, or processing.
